nodes.documentation:
Keeps track of whitelists and can check if sender and reciever are configured to allow a transfer.
Only administrators can update the whitelists.
Any address can only be a member of one whitelist at a time.
nodes.name: Whitelistable

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot add address 0x0 to a whitelist."

arguments.value: Cannot add address 0x0 to a whitelist.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot add address 0x0 to a whitelist."

nodes.documentation:
Sets an address's white list ID.  Only administrators should be allowed to update this.
If an address is on an existing whitelist, it will just get updated to the new value (removed from previous).
nodes.name: _addToWhitelist

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot remove address 0x0 from a whitelist."

arguments.value: Cannot remove address 0x0 from a whitelist.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot remove address 0x0 from a whitelist."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Address cannot be removed from invalid whitelist."

arguments.value: Address cannot be removed from invalid whitelist.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Address cannot be removed from invalid whitelist."

nodes.documentation: Clears out an address's white list ID.  Only administrators should be allowed to update this.
nodes.name: _removeFromWhitelist

nodes.documentation:
Sets the flag to indicate whether source whitelist is allowed to send to destination whitelist.
Only administrators should be allowed to update this.
nodes.name: _updateOutboundWhitelistEnabled

nodes.documentation:
Determine if the a sender is allowed to send to the receiver.
The source whitelist must be enabled to send to the whitelist where the receive exists.
nodes.name: checkWhitelistAllowed

nodes.documentation: Enable or disable the whitelist enforcement
nodes.name: setWhitelistEnabled

nodes.documentation: Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a whitelist
nodes.name: addToWhitelist

nodes.documentation: Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a whitelist
nodes.name: removeFromWhitelist

nodes.documentation: Public function that allows admins to update outbound whitelists
nodes.name: updateOutboundWhitelistEnabled

addToWhitelist(address,uint8).notice: Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a whitelist

checkWhitelistAllowed(address,address).notice: Determine if the a sender is allowed to send to the receiver. The source whitelist must be enabled to send to the whitelist where the receive exists.

removeFromWhitelist(address).notice: Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a whitelist

setWhitelistEnabled(bool).notice: Enable or disable the whitelist enforcement

updateOutboundWhitelistEnabled(uint8,uin.notice: Public function that allows admins to update outbound whitelists

userdoc.notice: Keeps track of whitelists and can check if sender and reciever are configured to allow a transfer. Only administrators can update the whitelists. Any address can only be a member of one whitelist at a time.
